scenario_text.value:
You know, I’ve never thought about it before,
but what do you guys normally eat?

Oh, you know. Grass, fruits, nuts, berries,
that sort of thing.

So, you’re herbivores? That’s kinda funny,
since you look like a T-rex.

But wait, sometimes you eat the same stuff we
do. Is that bad?

What? No, that’s not what I... Actually,
I guess it doesn’t matter.

You do seem to like it just fine. Guess that
makes you omnivores.

Well, everybody’s different. Some of us eat
tons of food, and others don’t eat at all.
I wanna eat lots of yummy stuff!
Right... Guess you guys remain a mystery.

What’s wrong, Takuma? Aren’t you going to
talk with Saki?
